property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the War and Earth schools of Magic. Arcane spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value:
Runesmithing: When an equipment comes into play attached to this mage, he may pay 1 mana to assign one Rune to it. If this equipment would be destroyed by a spell or ability an opponent controls, prevent that destruction unless that opponent pays 2 mana. Each rune may only be assigned once per game.
Battle Orders: Once per round, the Warlord may pay 1 mana and cast one of the following quick command spells. The chosen spell affects all friendly soldiers in his zone at the time it is cast, and the effect last until the end of the round.
Take Aim! - Ranged attacks gain Piercing +2; Quick March! - Gain Fast trait; Hold the Line! - Gain Armor +1 and Tough -2 traits. Battle Hardened: Warlord has the Tough -2 trait.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Dark and Fire schools. Holy spells cost triple during spellbook construction.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Fireweaving: Once per round, at the end of her Action Phase, the Warlock may target an object up to 2 zones away. She may move a Burn conditon from that object to another target object in that same zone. Smoldering Curses: Enemy creatures gain the Flame +1 trait if they have one or more revealed curse you control attached to them. Demonic Reward: If a friednly demon attacks and damages an enemy creature with a Burn condition, it may heal one damage. Each friendly demon may only trigger this ability once per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: All enchantments (hidden and revealed), within 1 zone of Harshforge Monolith, gain the Upkeep +1 trait.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Legendary, War Mage Only, Epic

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever a friendly soldier attacks and damages an enemy creature, you may place a place 1 mana on a friendly Spawnpoint or Familiar. Each friendly soldier may only trigger this ability once per round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Burnproof, Warlord Only, Epic

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, if you control 3 or more outposts, place a Domination token on Altar of Domination. During the Deployment Phase, if there are 4 or more Domination tokens on Altar, you may retrieve Talos from your spellbook and Summon it to this zone at no mana cost. Then, destroy Altar.

property.name: Text
property.value: May not be placed in a zone adjacent to another friendly outpost. All friendly soldiers gain Armor +1 and their attacks gain the Piercing +1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: May not be placed in a zone adjacent to another friendly outpost. Whenever a Nonliving Corporeal conjuration is destroyed, place an amount of mana equal to its Level on Construction Yard. Once per round, if you, or a friendly spawnpoint or familiar, casts a Nonliving Corporeal War Conjuration or an Earth wall, you may use any mana on Construction Yard to pay towards the casting cost for that spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: All objects and zones in the arena have the Obscured trait.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Blocks LOS, Passage Blocked, Extendable, Lightning Immunity, Flame Immunity, Hydro +2

property.name: Text
property.value: While Cerberus is guarding in a zone with a friendly Dark conjuration, he gains the Unmovable trait and his attack gains Triplestrike trait.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Crossbow Bolt;action type=Full;range type=Ranged;range=(1,2);dice=3;Piercing +X=2||name=Small Axe;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=3

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Bottle of Flaming Oil;action type=Full;range type=Ranged;range=(0,1);damage type=Flame;dice=2;effects={5: ['Burn']};Defrost=True||name=Flask of Ultimate Dissolver;action type=Full;range type=Ranged;range=(0,1);damage type=Acid;dice=3;effects={5: ['Corrode']}||name=Poison Dagger;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);damage type=Poison;dice=2;effects={8: ['Rot']}

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Bottle of Flaming Oil: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Flame] [Dice=2] [d12] [5+ = Burn] [Defrost] Flask of Ultimate Dissolver: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Acid] [Dice=3] [d12] [5+ = Corrode] Poison Dagger: [Quick] [Melee] [Poison] [Dice=2] [d12] [8+ = Rot]

property.name: Text
property.value: Gurmash can cast only command spells, including the Battle Orders of his controlling Warlord.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Maul;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=3||name=Reinforce;Place an Armor +X=1 token on, or Reconstruct 2 damage from, a Nonliving Corporeal conjuration in his zone (including walls bordering his zone).

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Maul: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=3] Reinforce: [Place an Armor +1 token on, or Reconstruct 2 damage from, a Nonliving Corporeal conjuration in his zone (including walls bordering his zone).]

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Crushing Jaw;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=5;Piercing +X=2||name=Tail Sweep;action type=Full;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=5;Sweeping=True||name=Poison Breath;action type=Full;range type=Ranged;range=(0,1);Zone Attack=True;damage type=Poison;dice=2;effects={8: ['Rot']};Unavoidable=True

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Crushing Jaw: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=5] [Piercing +2] Tail Sweep: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=5] [Sweeping] Poison Breath: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Zone Attack] [Poison] [Dice=2] [d12] [8+ = Rot] [Unavoidable]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase Sardonyx's controller loses 2 Life. Living creatures in the same zone as Sardonyx gain the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sersiryx can cast only Level 1-2 Fire attack spells, or Level 1-2 curse enchantments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Unstoppable, Burnproof, Unmovable, Psychic Immunity, Nonliving, Warlord Only, Epic

property.name: Text
property.value: Talos comes into play with his action marker ready. Talos may only be brought into play through the Altar of Domination. It costs no spellpoints to include Talos in your spellbook.

property.name: Text
property.value: Instead of taking a move action, Wildfire Imp may pay 1 mana to Teleport to a target zone with an object with a Burn marker on it. Wildfire Imp gains Melee +2 when it attacks an object with a Burn Marker on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever a Burn condition on this creature rolls a zero, you may pay 1 mana to prevent its removal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, if this creature makes a melee or ranged attack, you may re-roll all of the attack dice, or the effect die, for that attack. Or, if the attack has to roll to hit (such as with a Daze condition), you may re-roll that die roll instead. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability. [ReadyMarker]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, deal 1 direct damage to this creature for each enchantment (hidden and revealed ) attached to it that your opponent controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains Armor +4. At the end of the round, destroy Brace Yourself. [Armor +4]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature makes a non-spell, non-zone, attack, you may reveal Fumble immediately after the Declare Attack Step. The attack misses and does not affect the target object. Then, destroy Fumble. X = the creature's Level -1. Fumble has no effect on Unmovable creatures.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Charge +2 trait. Its melee attacks gain the Piercing +1 trait. [Charge +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of this Mage's Action Phase, they may pay 2 mana to place a Burn condition on target creature. That creature must have no Burn conditions, and at least one revealed curse you control attached to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Demons you control gain Melee +1 while in attacking an object with a Burn condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he, or a spawnpoint or familiar he controls, casts an equipment spell. [Casting Discount] [1] [Equipment] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he, or a spawnpoint he controls, casts a soldier spell. [Casting Discount] [1] [Soldier] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2. Enemy controlled enchantments and incantations, which target this Mage, cost 2 additional mana to cast. [Armor +2] [HarshforgePlate]

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove all Burn conditions from the target. Then, Combustion makes the above attack to the target where X is twice the number of Burn markers removed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target must not be attached to another object. If you control the target's zone, and have a friendly soldier in that zone, destroy the target. Then, as a free action, you may immediately cast the destroyed conjuration, or a non-Terrain conjuration spell from your spellbook, targeting this zone. X = the casting cost of the target.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you cast Disarm, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. Place a Disable marker on it. X = the object's Level.

property.name: Text
property.value: If target's next melee attack this round, attacks an enemy creature that was attacked and damaged by anther friendly soldier this round, then that attack gains the Piercing +2 trait, and target gains the Melee +2 trait, for that attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: If target does not already have a burn condition, it recives a Burn condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place a Guard marker on target, if it does not already have a Guard marker. X depends on the creature's Level: Level 1-2 = 1 Level 3-4 = 2 Level 5+ = 3
